citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A black female poodle (#01) requires dental care. In April, at the time of the dog's yearly physical, the Attending
Veterinarian indicated that the dog had a moderate buildup of tartar on her teeth and needed to have her teeth cleaned.
The licensee has not yet worked to get the dog's teeth cleaned and a thick coating of dark tartar remains on the dog's
teeth. Tartar buildup on the teeth can cause a painful mouth and infections of the gums and throughout the body if not
removed. The licensee must provide appropriate dental care to the dog. Correct by June 7, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A black female poodle (#01) requires dental care.  In April, at the time of the dog's yearly physical, the Attending 
Veterinarian indicated that the dog had a moderate buildup of tartar on her teeth and needed to have her teeth cleaned.  
The licensee has not yet worked to get the dog's teeth cleaned and a thick coating of dark tartar remains on the dog's 
teeth.  Tartar buildup on the teeth can cause a painful mouth and infections of the gums and throughout the body if not 
removed.  The licensee must provide appropriate dental care to the dog.  Correct by June 7, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
